            +" "allowAgentQuestions" "interceptTasks"
            + "autoCompactThreshold" "externalDiffToo
            +l" "permissions.manager" "permissions.wo
            +rker")
      14660 +    local SETTINGS_ITEMS_COUNT=11     #
            +10 config items + Close button
      14661
      14662      # Legacy aliases for compatibility
      14663      local HOOKS_INSTALLED=0  # 0=unknown
             , 1=installed, 2=not installed

⏺ Now update the settings_load_all_values() function to
  include interceptTasks:
